Introduction

Remota is an application which can be used as an air mouse and an air keyboard. You can remote control your host PC with simple user interfaces like a touch pad or Wii motion plus.

For first use

For first use, you need some preparations. Please go to the Help page.

Requirements

  • A Bluetooth dongle on your host PC
  • An application on your host PC
Remota runs on the Bluetooth Serial Port Profile(SPP), so you need a Bluetooth dongle. Packets from your phone to your host PC go on a Bluetooth serial port as general data, so your host PC needs an application for analyze this data.

Preparations
